idea:
Ujjivati uses web and mobile platforms to bring bio-pesticides directly to farmers.


Agrochemicals supply-chain for farmers is engulfed in multiple intermediaries. Product information is most often complex which forces farmers to pay exorbitant prices even for generic products. We use voice and text based mobile interface to provide agrochemicals directly to farmers at reasonable cost.
name: UJJIVATI BIOSCIENCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Vizcom Animations is a group of highly creative professionals with over 30 years of cumulative experience . We combine two powerful tools, Graphic Recording and Videography to develop highly creative and easy to understand explainer videos.

Our experience in various domains including payments, FinTech, Telecom, IT, Content, Consulting, etc,  gives us an edge to create powerful visualisations, PowerPoint presentations, and videos.

We create simple and easy to understand:

▪ Hand drawn whiteboard animation videos

▪ Tool based videoscribe

▪ 2D animation videos

▪ Infographic videos

▪ Technical Content

▪ Graphic visualization/Content visualization/Data visualization

▪ PowerPoint Presentations


We are based out of Mumbai & Bhopal and we proudly Make in India.
name: VIZCOM ANIMATIONS LLP

idea:
• Our honourable Prime Minister Mr Narendra Modi has given us the mantra of Swachh Bharat. Swacch Bharat as we understand is a behavioural change towards overall cleanliness. On that note we have come up with the idea of “Sachet Hand Sanitizer”. This product will be circulated amongst the mass Indian people to avoid hand spread diseases. The sachet will contain 1ml of hand sanitizer which can clean 99.99% of germs at a minimal cost of Re1. Sachet hand sanitizer are not available in the local markets, making this product an Innovative product.
• In the local market we get bottle sanitizers which are difficult to carry & use and it is not pocket friendly which refrains people from regularly using sanitizers.
• In India, major part of the population prefers to have their meals with hands. The scalability of the business is humongous. Creating awareness through media, ngos and other social activities will be the part of the business. Once the awareness is created the product can be sold from airlines to local pan shops . It is a PAN india project which will create huge employment through distribution network from various walks of life, specially for the economically deprived people. We are in talks with various Ngos who are working on the ground level with Women who are economically weak. We would like to engage them and empower them by involving them in the business.
name: KD SANITIZATION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Presolv360 is India’s first homegrown tech-enabled dispute management platform capable of preventing litigation, protecting people and businesses from adversities of disputes and resolving them through time-tested dispute resolution mechanisms.
name: EDGECRAFT SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
